item.title: [pi] One alter gives ancient then lunar then regular[pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

I want to make a alter (8749) to if your on regular mage book and u click it then u go to ancient and if your on ancient and click it you go to lunar and if your on lunar you go to regular. You probly get where i am going
regular–(click alter)–>ancient–(click alter)–>lunar–(click alter)–>regular

the code is below of what i have

main base code have it to where it only goes from regular to ancient to regular need to add lunar to it

		case 8749:
			if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
				c.playerMagicBook = 1;
				c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
				c.sendMessage("An ancient wisdomin fills your mind.");
				c.getPA().resetAutocast();
			} else {
				c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
				c.playerMagicBook = 0;
				c.sendMessage("You feel a drain on your 

memory.");
				c.autocastId = -1;
				c.getPA().resetAutocast();
			}	
		break;

k now lunar alter by it self

		case 410:
			if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
				c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999);
				c.playerMagicBook = 2;
				c.sendMessage("The power of the moon overpowers 

you.");
				c.autocastId = -1;
				c.getPA().resetAutocast();
			}	
		break;
